original: Åringr, Oscar Albert Harry, direktör, Borås, f. 4/12/98 i Nårunga, Älvsb. 1. G. 30 m, Marget Danielsson. Barn: Marita f. 38. — Avg:ex. v. Borås tekn. vävsk. 23. Vol. v. Maschinen-Fabr. Rüti 23-24. Ärl. res. t. Tyskl. o. Belg. 34-38, t. Frankr. o. Belg. 37. Mönsterrit. v. Viskabergs Fabr. 24-27, vävmäst. v. A-B Sjuntorp 27-28, inköpschef v. A-B Textilkomp. 28-33, diisp. v. A-B Borås Draperi- & Gardin-fabr. fr. 33. Sekr. i Heminredn :bransch. textilfabr :ifören. fr. 42.
translated: Oscar Albert Harry Åringr, director, Borås, born December 4, 1898 in Nårunga, Älvsborg. First marriage in 1930 to Marget Danielsson. Child: Marita, born in 1938. Previous occupations: apprentice at Borås Technical Weaving School until 1923. Employee at Maschinen-Fabr. Rüti from 1923 to 1924. Reserve officer in Germany and Belgium from 1934 to 1938, and in France and Belgium in 1937. Pattern designer at Viskabergs Fabric from 1924 to 1927. Master weaver at A-B Sjuntorp from 1927 to 1928. Purchasing manager at A-B Textile Company from 1928 to 1933. Manager at A-B Borås Drapery & Curtain Factory from 1933. Secretary in the Home Furnishing and Textile Industry Association from 1942.

organization.name: Home Furnishing and Textile Industry Association
